Tim Burton directorial 'Beetlejuice Beetlejuice' to arrives in Indian cinemas this September

Tim Burton's highly anticipated sequel to the 1988 classic, "Beetlejuice," is set to haunt Indian theatres on September 6. Titled "Beetlejuice Beetlejuice," the film brings back Michael Keaton as the titular character, joined by Winona Ryder and Catherine O'Hara.

02 Feb, 2024, 03:55 PM IST

Is live-action ‘Nightmare Before Christmas’ movie starring Johnny Depp in the works?

Recent enthusiasm among The Nightmare Before Christmas fans soared when an alleged poster for a live-action adaptation with Johnny Depp surfaced online. Unfortunately, the excitement was premature, fueled by a concocted report intended to amuse on April Fools' Day.

‘Beetlejuice 2’ Filming Wrapped, Tim Burton Announces on Instagram

As the calendar flips from November to December, filming on Beetlejuice 2 has officially completed. Director Tim Burton celebrated the occasion with an Instagram post this morning. Burton says that they have just finished filming Beetlejuice and expresses gratitude to everyone involved.

30 Nov, 2023, 09:31 PM IST

Willem Dafoe spills details on 'Beetlejuice 2' as cast and release date faces uncertainty; here's everything you need to know

Willem Dafoe shares insights on his role in 'Beetlejuice 2,' a sequel to the 1988 classic. The film, facing possible delays due to industry strikes, reunites original stars like Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder, and Catherine O’Hara. With Dafoe playing a deceased cop, the plot hints at Lydia’s daughter taking center stage. Director Tim Burton returns amid filming challenges, aiming for a September 6, 2024 release. Expect fresh locations and a blend of nostalgia in this eagerly anticipated continuation.

27 Nov, 2023, 11:39 PM IST

Willem Dafoe dives into the afterlife as police officer in Tim Burton's 'Beetlejuice 2'

The film, set to release on September 6, 2024, will feature Michael Keaton reprising his role as Beetlejuice, with Winona Ryder and Catherine O'Hara also returning.

"Deadpool 3," starring Ryan Reynolds, to resume production as SAG-AFTRA strike ends

The production of the movie "Deadpool 3" will start again in January after the December holidays so there will be a May release for the film. The production was delayed because of the strike but now wait for the fans is soon going to be over.

09 Nov, 2023, 09:01 PM IST

Beetlejuice streaming: Where to watch the cult classic online

Beetlejuice, released on March 30, 1998, is renowned as one of the most cherished and enduring classic cult comedy films. It remains a suitable choice for viewing during the Halloween season or any other time of the year, offering a blend of thrills and laughter. The movie features Tim Burton in a prominent role, and he certainly succeeded in captivating his fans to the fullest.

29 Oct, 2023, 01:28 AM IST

Guinness World Record: Tim Burton-inspired pumpkin mosaic celebrates 30th anniversary of 'The Nightmare Before Christmas'

Sunnyfields Farm in Southampton has set a new Guinness World Record by creating a pumpkin and squash mosaic inspired by Tim Burton's "The Nightmare Before Christmas." The mosaic, made from over 10,000 pumpkins and squashes, covers nearly 200 square meters and depicts the moonlight stance of Jack Skellington. The farm's staff spent five hours creating the artwork, which now holds the title for the largest mosaic ever made from squashes.

23 Oct, 2023, 09:05 PM IST

Taylor Swift's 'The Eras Tour' concert film continues winning streak at box-office, beats Martin Scorsese's 'Killers of the Flower Moon'

Taylor Swift's concert film, 'Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour,' continued to dominate the box office, earning $31 million over the weekend. Meanwhile, Martin Scorsese's 'Killers of the Flower Moon' had a strong start, grossing $23 million in its opening weekend.
